body_html: I have 48 cpu cores and 4 gpu cores. I am using tfrecord reader. Even with a trivial network, my cpu utilization is capped at 1800%. I tried sharding my input data and using parallel_interleave but there is no usage improvement.

body: I have 48 cpu cores and 4 gpu cores. I am using tfrecord reader. Even with a trivial network, my cpu utilization is capped at 1800%. I tried sharding my input data and using parallel_interleave but there is no usage improvement.
